0871A46B.Toast: Help Scholar Yuein find his old apprentice

A6927FEF.Phase127Description: Éadaoin's spirit has been banished and put to rest. I should return to Túr Dúlra and tell Yuein my findings.

B2767ACE.Phase144Description: I found the spot where Éadaoin perished. Investigating the remains may reveal what befell the young druid.

C4595E4B.Phase114Description: Scholar Yuein's previous apprentice died during the Astaroth attacks. He has sensed her spirit in the Deepwood, unable to pass on. He wishes for me to find her.
